title: Trevor Discusses Violence Against Women | Nomzamo Mbatha
itunes:title: Trevor Discusses Violence Against Women | Nomzamo Mbatha
description:
Trevor examines the all-encompassing scourge of violence against women, Dulce Sloan celebrates activist women athletes, and Nomzamo Mbatha talks about landing her role in "Coming 2 America."


To help provide housing, legal services and leadership development for formerly incarcerated women, please donate at dailyshow.com/ANewWayOfLife.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
